summary: Civic Suite testing completed successfully. All 7 API endpoints working correctly, returning expected demo data. Both UI pages (/civic/admin and /civic/constituents) load and function properly with filters and navigation.
critical_code_review_comments: MOCKED: All civic service implementations (constituent-service.ts, dues-service.ts, service-request-service.ts, certificate-service.ts, event-service.ts, voting-service.ts) use in-memory storage - not connected to real database
Demo data is well-structured with 6 members, 7 dues records, 5 service requests, 4 certificates, 4 events, and 3 polls
All API endpoints follow consistent patterns with proper filtering, pagination, and stats
UI pages have proper data-testid attributes for testing

success_rate.frontend: 100% (2/2 pages load correctly, filters and navigation work)

seed_data_creation: None - uses demo data from in-memory services
context_for_next_testing_agent: Civic Suite is fully functional with demo data. All 7 API endpoints work without authentication. Demo organization is 'Harmony Estate Residents Association' with Nigerian civic context (LGAs, CDAs, Estate Associations). Services use in-memory storage following same pattern as Education and Health suites.

frontend_pages: /civic/admin - Admin Dashboard with stats (6 members, â‚¦50,000 collected, 3 open requests, 0 upcoming events, 3 polls scheduled), quick actions, pending actions, civic modules navigation
/civic/constituents - Members page with 6 demo members, search filter, status filter, type filter, member details (name, member number, phone, ward, contributions, outstanding balance)
ui_interactions: Search filter - filters members by name (PASSED)
Status filter dropdown - filters by ACTIVE/SUSPENDED/PENDING (PASSED)
Type filter dropdown - filters by LANDLORD/RESIDENT/TENANT (PASSED)
Navigation between admin dashboard and members page (PASSED)

mocked_apis_note: MOCKED: All civic service implementations use in-memory storage and return demo/stub data. This is intentional as the services follow the same pattern as Education and Health suites.
